languages.text: "Собрать достаточно зараженных, дать болезни развиться, постичь ее и затем — убить. У хвори несколько стадий, и каждая таит ответы о ее природе и слабых местах. Матросам придется некоторое время побыть больными, чтобы я нашел исцеление. Если, конечно, зараза обратима на финальных стадиях".

traits.locale_text: "Так и есть. У хвори несколько стадий, и каждая таит ответы о ее природе и слабых местах. Матросам придется некоторое время побыть больными, чтобы я нашел исцеление".

languages.text: "By gathering enough infected individuals together, letting the illness progress, comprehending its properties, and, finally, killing it. The disease goes through several stages, with each containing clues to its nature and vulnerabilities. The voidsmen will have to stay sick for some time until I discover the cure, assuming, of course, that the disease is reversible in its final stages."
languages.original_text: "Собрать достаточно зараженных, дать болезни развиться, постичь ее и затем — убить. У хвори несколько стадий, и каждая таит ответы о ее природе и слабых местах. Матросам придется некоторое время побыть больными, чтобы я нашел исцеление. Если, конечно, зараза обратима на финальных стадиях".

languages.text: « En rassemblant suffisamment de sujets infectés, en laissant la maladie se propager, en analysant ses propriétés et enfin, en trouvant un moyen de l'éliminer. Cette pathologie passe par plusieurs stades, dont chacun recèle des indices quant à sa nature et ses failles. Les cosmomarins devront rester malades le temps pour moi de découvrir un remède, en espérant bien sûr que leur affection soit réversible jusque dans sa phase terminale. »
languages.original_text: "By gathering enough infected individuals together, letting the illness progress, comprehending its properties, and, finally, killing it. The disease goes through several stages, with each containing clues to its nature and vulnerabilities. The voidsmen will have to stay sick for some time until I discover the cure, assuming, of course, that the disease is reversible in its final stages."

traits.locale_text: « En rassemblant suffisamment de sujets infectés, en laissant la maladie se propager, en analysant ses propriétés et enfin, en trouvant un moyen de l'éliminer. Cette pathologie passe par plusieurs stades, dont chacun recèle des indices quant à sa nature et ses failles. Les cosmomarins devront rester malades le temps pour moi de découvrir un remède, en espérant bien sûr que leur affection soit réversible jusque dans sa phase terminale. »

languages.text: «Reuniendo a un número suficiente de individuos infectados, dejando que la enfermedad progrese, comprendiendo sus propiedades y, por último, erradicándola. La enfermedad tiene varias etapas, cada una de ellas contiene pistas sobre su naturaleza y momentos vulnerables. Los infantes del vacío tendrán que seguir enfermos un tiempo hasta que descubra la cura. Siempre y cuando sea reversible en sus etapas finales, claro».
languages.original_text: "By gathering enough infected individuals together, letting the illness progress, comprehending its properties, and, finally, killing it. The disease goes through several stages, with each containing clues to its nature and vulnerabilities. The voidsmen will have to stay sick for some time until I discover the cure, assuming, of course, that the disease is reversible in its final stages."

traits.locale_text: «Reuniendo a un número suficiente de individuos infectados, dejando que la enfermedad progrese, comprendiendo sus propiedades y, por último, erradicándola. La enfermedad tiene varias etapas, cada una de ellas contiene pistas sobre su naturaleza y momentos vulnerables. Los infantes del vacío tendrán que seguir enfermos un tiempo hasta que descubra la cura. Siempre y cuando sea reversible en sus etapas finales, claro».

languages.text: 「十分な数の感染者を集め、病気を進行させ、その特性を理解し、最後にそれを殺す。 この病気にはいくつかの段階があり、それぞれに病気の性質や弱点を知る手がかりがあります。私が治療法を発見するまで、ヴォイズマンたちはしばらく病気のまま過ごさなければなりません。もちろん、病気が最終段階まで進行してしまっても、完治させることが可能だと仮定しての実験ですが」
languages.original_text: "By gathering enough infected individuals together, letting the illness progress, comprehending its properties, and, finally, killing it. The disease goes through several stages, with each containing clues to its nature and vulnerabilities. The voidsmen will have to stay sick for some time until I discover the cure, assuming, of course, that the disease is reversible in its final stages."

traits.locale_text: 「十分な数の感染者を集め、病気を進行させ、その特性を理解し、最後にそれを殺す。 この病気にはいくつかの段階があり、それぞれに病気の性質や弱点を知る手がかりがあります。私が治療法を発見するまで、ヴォイズマンたちはしばらく病気のまま過ごさなければなりません。もちろん、病気が最終段階まで進行してしまっても、完治させることが可能だと仮定しての実験ですが」

languages.text: “我会把许多感染者聚集在一起，让这种疾病自由发展，了解它的特点，最后将其消灭。这种疾病会经历好几个不同的阶段，每个阶段都有各自的特点与弱点。在我找到治疗方法之前，这些船员恐怕还得再病上一段时间才能治愈，当然，前提是这种疾病的最后阶段是可以治愈的。”
languages.original_text: "By gathering enough infected individuals together, letting the illness progress, comprehending its properties, and, finally, killing it. The disease goes through several stages, with each containing clues to its nature and vulnerabilities. The voidsmen will have to stay sick for some time until I discover the cure, assuming, of course, that the disease is reversible in its final stages."

traits.locale_text: “我会把许多感染者聚集在一起，让这种疾病自由发展，了解它的特点，最后将其消灭。这种疾病会经历好几个不同的阶段，每个阶段都有各自的特点与弱点。在我找到治疗方法之前，这些船员恐怕还得再病上一段时间才能治愈，当然，前提是这种疾病的最后阶段是可以治愈的。”

languages.text: "Ich werde ausreichend Infizierte zusammenführen, der Krankheit ihren Lauf lassen, die Symptome vergleichen und sie schließlich ausmerzen. Die Krankheit durchläuft mehrere Phasen, die Rückschlüsse auf ihre Natur und Schwächen zulässt. Die Raumfahrer müssen eine Weile krank bleiben, bis ich ein Heilmittel gefunden habe, sofern die Krankheit in ihren ersten Phasen überhaupt heilbar ist, versteht sich.
languages.original_text: "By gathering enough infected individuals together, letting the illness progress, comprehending its properties, and, finally, killing it. The disease goes through several stages, with each containing clues to its nature and vulnerabilities. The voidsmen will have to stay sick for some time until I discover the cure, assuming, of course, that the disease is reversible in its final stages."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde ausreichend Infizierte zusammenführen, der Krankheit ihren Lauf lassen, die Symptome vergleichen und sie schließlich ausmerzen. Die Krankheit durchläuft mehrere Phasen, die Rückschlüsse auf ihre Natur und Schwächen zulässt. Die Raumfahrer müssen eine Weile krank bleiben, bis ich ein Heilmittel gefunden habe, sofern die Krankheit in ihren ersten Phasen überhaupt heilbar ist, versteht sich.

languages.text: "Yeterli sayıda enfekte bireyi bir araya getirip hastalığın ilerlemesine müsaade edeceğim. Özelliklerini kavrayıp en nihayetinde de onu yok edeceğim. Hastalık, pek çok aşamadan geçiyor. Her bir aşama, tabiatına ve zayıf noktalarına dair ipuçları içeriyor. Uçsuz erlerinin tedavi geliştirene kadar bir süre hasta kalmaları gerekecek. Tabii ki hastalığın son aşamasında tedavi edilebildiğini varsayıyorum."
languages.original_text: "By gathering enough infected individuals together, letting the illness progress, comprehending its properties, and, finally, killing it. The disease goes through several stages, with each containing clues to its nature and vulnerabilities. The voidsmen will have to stay sick for some time until I discover the cure, assuming, of course, that the disease is reversible in its final stages."
